news.title: Proud Partnership with Chemonics International Inc. in Kyrgyz Republic
news.description:
We are delighted to announce that we have successfully supplied an advanced apricot washing and processing machine to Chemonics International Inc. in the Kyrgyz Republic. This machine is specially designed to enhance the efficiency, quality, and safety of apricot processing, supporting the local agricultural sector.

We extend our sincere thanks to Chemonics International Inc. for entrusting us with this project. Their commitment to sustainable agriculture in the Kyrgyz Republic resonates with our values, and we are honored to contribute to this meaningful initiative. We look forward to more partnerships that drive positive impact worldwide.

news.title: Official Distributor of MTG Mining Products in Kyrgyzstan
news.description:
We are excited to announce that we have become the official distributor of MTG’s renowned mining product range in Kyrgyzstan. MTG is a global leader specializing in the design and manufacture of premium ground engaging tools, crafted for mining, construction, and dredging machinery.

This partnership allows us to bring MTG’s innovative and high-quality solutions to the Kyrgyz market, supporting clients with tools that enhance efficiency and durability in tough operational environments. We are proud to work with MTG and look forward to delivering top-tier products to meet the growing needs of the region.

news.title: Test1
news.description: The recent charity event organized by our team was a huge success, raising over $100,000 for local communities.

news.title: Test2
news.description: Our company has reached a major milestone by expanding our operations to 50 countries worldwide.
